00024 
00025         //eventually, I should use the Boost libraries 
00026         //and make the pointers returned by this class 
00027         //to be shared pointers, which will then 
00028         //make them safer to delete. 
00029         //when an instance of the factory is destroyed,
00030         //it will attempt to delete all of the events that it created
00031         //unless another client is using it. then it won't delete it.

00033         //will call KEventFactory::DeleteEvent(KEvent*);
00034         //or just let it go out of scope
